issue.title: [C++] Strip uninformative lcov output from Travis CI logs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2813](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2813). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have about 650 lines of the type:

```Java

geninfo: WARNING: no data found for /usr/include/c++/4.8/istream
```

We should maybe pipe all the lcov output to a file and print any lines that reference things other than /usr/include

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2813?focusedCommentId=16568995) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2367
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2367>
